author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video we test out RETRONIX on the Retroid Pocket Flip 2 and this new handheld runs Xbox and PS3 Emulation! Playing Halo 2 on an arm based handheld is pretty awesome for sure! RetroNIX is a Linux OS that runs from an SD Card allowing the Retroid Pocket Flip 2 and Pocket 5 to runs emualtos like XEMU,  RPCS3 and may many more!

Buy the Retroid Pocket Flip 2 Here: https://www.goretroid.com/products/retroid-pocket-flip-2?srsltid=AfmBOoqhFZ7En0blPcs6RavelO4tEyabyD9Yp6VeWKCnoKr0f8NhUL6W&sca_ref=2985949.aFrgTZqsDf

Learn More about RETRONIX Here: https://rocknix.org/
